contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced stub|auto=yes|date=December 2009}} '''Zygmunt Jan Kisielewski''' (27 March 1882 – 25 April 1942) was a Polish writer, brother of [[Jan August Kisielewski|Jan August]] and father of [[Stefan Kisielewski|Stefan]]. During [[World War I]] (1914–1917) he was a combatant in the [[Polish Legions in World War I|Polish Legions]]. He was an editor of [[Robotnik|Robotnik (The Worker)]] from 1918 to 1925. He also authored books on social-national and military subjects. His memoir is entitled ''Poranek''. {{Authority control|VIAF=49215500}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Kisielewski, Zygmunt | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = | DATE OF BIRTH = 27 March 1882 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = 25 April 1942 | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Kisielewski, Zygmunt}} [[Category:Polish writers]] [[Category:1882 births]] [[Category:1942 deaths]] [[Category:Burials at Powązki Cemetery]] {{Poland-writer-stub}}
